attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This does not need 1000 words just an acknowledgement of fact. Having resigned from office on two previous occasions for reasons which sectors of the general public has previously considered have made him unfit for office, Peter Mandelson should resign from the Cabinet with immediate effect and failing this, Gordon Brown should remove him from office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
